wordGroup: geographic information system [地]地理信息系统
geographic distribution 地理分布，地理分配
national geographic society （美国）国家地理学会
geographic coordinates n. 地理坐标

sentences.en: Outdoor advertising has a high degree of geographic flexibility.
sentences.cn: 户外广告具有高度的地域灵活性。

sentences.en: Geographic isolation also can proceed slowly, over great spans of time.
sentences.cn: 地理隔离也可能在很长一段时间内进展都非常缓慢。

sentences.en: In this interview with National Geographic, Kish explains how the process works.
sentences.cn: 在接受国家地理杂志采访时，基什解释了这个过程是如何进行的。
